flawed_nl_solution:
Tedra harvests 1/2 * 400 kg = <<1/2*400=800/1>>800/1 kg of tomatoes on Thursday.
Tedra harvests 2000 kg - 400 kg - 800/1 kg = <<2000-400-800/1=800>>800 kg of tomatoes on Friday.
After giving away tomatoes to his friends, he is left with 800 kg - 700 kg = <<800-700=100>>100 kg of tomatoes.
#### 100

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 200, not 800/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
